tips.tram36: Tram Route 36 passes through the most heritage spots - perfect for a vintage tour!
tips.pujoPandals: Best Durga Puja pandals are in South Kolkata - start at Ekdalia Evergreen
tips.coffeeHouse: For authentic adda, visit Indian Coffee House on College Street since 1942
tips.kumartuliArtisans: Kumartuli artisans start work on idols 4 months before Pujo - visit in July!
tips.collegeStreetBooks: College Street has the largest second-hand book market in the world
tips.princepGhatSunset: Princep Ghat sunset views are magical - arrive 30 mins before sunset
tips.biryani: Try Arsalan's biryani or 6 Ballygunge Place for authentic Bengali cuisine
tips.victoriaMemorial: Victoria Memorial is best visited early morning to avoid crowds
tips.yellowTaxis: Yellow taxis follow meter + ‚Çπ10 rule for short distances in the city
tips.jorasanko: Jorasanko Thakur Bari has Tagore's original artworks - don't miss it!
tips.kalighatTemple: Kalighat Temple allows short visits - go during aarti for the experience
tips.howrahBridge: Howrah Bridge carries 100,000 vehicles daily - walk across at dawn!
tips.parkStreet: Park Street transforms during Christmas - best visited after 7 PM
tips.rabindraSadan: Rabindra Sadan hosts classical concerts - check schedule for baul performances
tips.mishtiDoi: Don't leave without trying mishti doi and sandesh from Balaram Mullick

anirban.name: Anirban Chatterjee
anirban.comment: The heritage walk through Kumartuli was magical! Watching artisans create Durga idols with such devotion - this app helped me discover the soul of Kolkata.

sarah.name: Sarah Chen
sarah.comment: The Durga Puja route planner was a lifesaver! Visited 15 pandals without getting lost. The AI knew exactly when to avoid crowds.

rahul.name: Rahul Ghosh
rahul.comment: Born in Kolkata but this app showed me places I never knew existed! The College Street book walk was pure nostalgia.

emma.name: Emma Williams
emma.comment: The tram heritage tour was unforgettable! Riding through Esplanade at sunset while the audio guide narrated history - pure magic.

priya.name: Priya Mukherjee
priya.comment: Bought authentic Baluchari saree from verified artisans through this app. Blockchain certificate proves it's genuine handloom!

james.name: James Thompson
james.comment: The Adda AI companion talked about Tagore like a true Kolkatan! Recommended the best mishti doi shop - exactly what locals prefer.
